item.title: #001: Getting Started
item.description: Day 1: Review This was my plan for Day 1 - here’s what I actually achieved: Reviewed README.md to get high-level overview of Playwright. Completed Getting Started to validate my local testing setup. Explored Try Playwright in browser to review example scenarios Let’s dive into each of these. Playwright: An Overview What is Playwright? It’s a Node.JS library that can automate cross-browser testing (against Chromium, Firefox and WebKit based browsers) with a single unified API.
